item.title: Fed votes to reappoint all of its regional bank presidents
item.description: The Fed on Thursday reappointed 11 of its 12 regional bank presidents, ending a minidrama in a move that came a bit earlier than usual.

item.title: For investors all-in on Magnificent 7-led market, 'equal weight' is trending as stock call for 2026
item.description: With the S&P 500 Index concentrated in a handful of tech stocks, the equal-weight market approach is getting more attention in portfolio planning for ...

item.title: Fed's Goolsbee says he's uncomfortable front-loading too many rate cuts
item.description: Chicago Federal Reserve President Austan Goolsbee spoke Friday morning on CNBC.

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves premarket: Tilray Brands, Lululemon, Broadcom, Citigroup & more

item.title: VanEck turns online slang into strategy with 'Degen Economy' ETF
item.description: The firm is renaming its gaming ETF (BJK) the "VanEck Degen Economy ETF."
